input.sentences: tiny tree growing in secluded area .
the warm milk is ready to drink .
the peaceful forest has a person looking out .
the visitors are coming to the house .
the garden does not have any people .
output.sentences: I planted a tiny tree in the garden.
And then went inside the house and enjoyed some warm milk.
I took the milk outside to enjoy the peaceful foliage.
Then I took a walk to the nearby temple to meditate.
Walking around the gardens there was a very peaceful experience.
